doc.field: Spadafora's exam booklets from chemistry class at Queens (1975), notebook from criminal justice courses at CW Post (1978-79), notebooks from physics at John Jay (1985), workbooks from a first aid course (1970s?), Spadafora's paper (original with photos, and a photocopy) titled "Arson: the Problem, the Investigation, and Possible Solutions" for his Masters Degree at LIU/CW Post (1982). 2 packets of clippings, one labeled "criminal justice newspaper articles", the other unlabeled but also related to crime. Print matter: books/pamphlets on crime, criminal justice, arson, firearms. Artifacts: ear protectors in connection with firearms. 2 VHS videocassettes: "Learn Gun Safety with Eddie Eagle" and Goshin Club's "A Woman's Guide to Firearms." (Includes video, artifacts)
